xorenergydrink.name: xorenergydrink
xorenergydrink.description:
A centuries old formula designed to keep you sharp and alert for longer, popular with spacefarers across the universe. 

Drink during planet visits for two extra hours of activity.

fedcursingdoll.name: fedcursingdoll
fedcursingdoll.description:
Just an ordinary beat-up doll of those damned Feds... or is it? 

Saves you .1 sanity every day in travel as long as 
it is in your inventory.

piratebadge.name: piratebadge
piratebadge.description:
Your old, tattered ensignia for Sol Pyrates Squadron 4. 

In your opinion, it still looks cool as ever.

upgradekit.name: upgradekit
upgradekit.description:
A high level automated upgrade kit stolen years ago by the Feds. 

Use anywhere to upgrade your engine.

goldbag.name: goldbag
goldbag.description: A nice plump bag of gold.

childtoy.name: childtoy
childtoy.description: A well crafted toy for the common civilian child.

book.name: book
book.description: A Proto-Neptuvian novel worth reading in one sitting. Increases your Sanity by 10 when read.

andrometine.name: andrometine
andrometine.description:
Once an infamous substance which brought down entire galactic civilizations with its entrancing effects, the recent varieties only seem to mildly soothe the body.

 +30 Sanity increase when consumed.

mystiviancharm.name: mystiviancharm
mystiviancharm.description:
A strange, beautiful pendant which exudes a steadfast and ethereal aura.

Permanently increases engine efficiency by 3 when consumed.

federationinfogoggles.name: federationinfogoggles
federationinfogoggles.description:
An ancient piece of puzzling technology, designed to give soldiers unit locations, orders, and descriptions, all during the heat of battle.

Gives a complete description of each target's attributes while in your inventory.

tomfruit.name: tomfruit
tomfruit.description: A juicy and delectable fruit, somehow common throughout planets in the local supergalaxy for mysterious reasons.

furs.name: furs
furs.description: The warm and versatile skin of an animal well-adapted to the cold.

coal.name: coal
coal.description: A crude, yet highly efficient and exothermic material, used mainly for heating applications.

rawgems.name: rawgems
rawgems.description: Unprocessed stones of various colors collected from ancient river and liquid deposits, dried up millions of years ago.
